detailedDescription.articleBody: Solomon Kerzner, K.C.M.G. is a South African accountant and business magnate. His family started a hotel chain; after Kerzner graduated with a B.Com, B.Com from the University of the Witwatersrand, Johannesburg and qualified as a Chartered Accountant, he took over the running of the group and went on to create the most successful hotel group in South Africa, Sun International.
